name: Space Junk Crusader
description:
Use your comically powerful gun to blast yourself into the air, destroying the Russian space junk to save Apollo 11's launchpad!

'Murican Space Sim of the Century.

Credit: Art from OpenGameArt.org. SFX from SoundBible.com. Music: "Final Redemption" by Xtullor (from Newgrounds.com)
